title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: The bug report does not provide an observed behavior.
EB: The dynamic text item should display the datetime value in the same format as the data/text item.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a table with datetime values.
2. Create three items: a data/text item, a dynamic text item, and an input item.
3. Set the content of all three items to 'new Date()'.
4. Save the changes.
5. Preview the page.
6. Verify that the data/text item and the dynamic text item are displaying the datetime value in the same format.
